<!-- Replace  -->
<svg  class="mybox" style="border: solid" x="0" y="0"  viewBox="0, 0, 500, 250">
  <g id="Layer_1">
 
        
	  
	  <circle cx="250" cy="250" r="250" stroke="black" stroke-width="0" fill={{dialColor  value}} />
	  <circle cx="250" cy="250" r="200" stroke="black" stroke-width="0" fill="#353c51" />
	  <path  transform="rotate({{ mappedValue value}} 250 250)"  d="M25 250 a200 200 0 1 1 450 0" fill-opacity="0" stroke="#303030" stroke-width="53"/>
  
  <text text-anchor="middle"
          x="250" y="150" style="font-size: 80px;" fill="{{dialColor value}}">{{ value}}</text>
  <text text-anchor="middle"
          x="250" y="220" style="font-size: 30px;" fill="{{dialColor value}}">{{legend}}</text>
  </g>
</svg>
